SEARCH
Package main

Class BattleSystem

java.lang.Object
main.BattleSystem
public class BattleSystem extends Object
The BattleSystem class handles turn-based battles between the player's party and monsters.

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleSystem

      public BattleSystem(partyManager party, shadowStandar monster, GamePanel gp)
      Constructs a BattleSystem object with the specified party, monster, and GamePanel.
      Parameters:
      party - The player's party.
      monster - The enemy monster.
      gp - The GamePanel.

  • Method Details

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Proceeds to the next turn in the battle, resetting the pressTurn.

    • attack

      public void attack(Entity attacker, Entity target)
      Handles an attack by an entity against another entity.
      Parameters:
      attacker - The attacking entity.
      target - The target entity.

    • monsterAttack

      public void monsterAttack(Entity attacker, Entity target)
      Handles a monster's attack against a target entity.
      Parameters:
      attacker - The monster attacking entity.
      target - The target entity.

    • useMagic

      public void useMagic(Entity attacker, Entity target, superMagic selectedSpell)
      Performs a magic attack from the attacker to the target entity using a selected spell.
      Parameters:
      attacker - The entity performing the magic attack.
      target - The entity being attacked.
      selectedSpell - The magic spell used for the attack.

    • monsterUseMagic

      public void monsterUseMagic(Entity attacker, Entity target, superMagic selectedSpell)
      Performs a magic attack from the monster to the target entity using a selected spell.
      Parameters:
      attacker - The monster performing the magic attack.
      target - The entity being attacked.
      selectedSpell - The magic spell used for the attack.

    • monsterAI

      public void monsterAI()
      Handles the AI decision-making for the monster's attacks and spells.

    • getTargetSlot

      public void getTargetSlot(Entity target)
      Retrieves the slot index of the specified target entity within the player's party members. Prints the name of the target entity to the console.
      Parameters:
      target - The entity for which to determine the slot index.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Entity item)
      Uses a health potion item to restore health to a party member.
      Parameters:
      item - The health potion item to be used.

    • defend

      public void defend(Entity entity)
      Allows an entity to defend during their turn. Reduces the damage received in the next turn.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity defending (e.g., player or monster).

    • fleeFromBattle

      public void fleeFromBattle()
      Implements the player's attempt to flee from the battle. The outcome of the escape attempt is determined randomly.

    • negotiateMonster

      public void negotiateMonster()
      Initiates the negotiation process with the monster. The NegotiationSystem is responsible for handling the negotiation.

    • endBattle

      public void endBattle()
      Ends the battle, granting experience points to the player and party and handling loot.
